name: Mint Julep
description: A refreshing summery whisky based drink, best consumed on a hot day - or any day really.
steps: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in the bottle of a rocks or julep glass.
Add bourbon and full with crushed ice.
Stir thoroughly until glass is chilled.
footnote: As a bonus, garnish with sprig of mint and a couple of dashes of Angustura bitters.
